channel.title: Ballsy terrorist attack
channel.description:
British doctors reported today a devious attack on Tom's left testicle.
"Sneak attack devestates a testicle, damage is possibly permanent!" wrote Elizbabeth the II, Queen of England on Twitter.
She also posted a photograph in which the mutiliated testicle can be seen being operated on.
"This attack could spell disaster for the running of MoparScape" commented Travis Burtrum, notorious Commander-in-chief of MoparScape.
The patient was rushed urgently to the nearest hospital where he was sent into an intensive care unit. Doctors expect a full recovery of Tom's testicle within weeks.
This is not the first time such an attack has occured, famous ex-admin ThugLife (also known as fr33sc4p3) has suffered similar attacks on his testicles twice -- it is a mystery how he has managed to survive thus far.

item.title: Ballsy terrorist attack

@doom_j wrote:

Sir Tom I hope you get better soon!
